title: Broken Screen (HELP)
body:
So i joined in on a normal lol game (draft pick), and this is what my screen looked like. i tried reconnecting several times but nothing changed. i could still move on the screen but it was only limited to that area that i could see. i couldnt play with this screen, it was impossible so i left the game after almost 20 min of disconnecting and turning off the whole computer off and on. BTW i am playing on a macbook pro retina. Please leave serious replies if you know the problem here, and thanks.

LINK:----

replies.body: I snipped out your link because it's a local directory and not an upload.  I'm assuming this is regarding the 1/4 screen issue based on your details.  We're looking into this now, but we found that tapping Alt+Enter in-game can work as a workaround by taking you out of fullscreen mode.  I hope that helps!

Porocles, I need your help!!! I have the 1/4 screen problem and now i have a 20 min leave buster for 5 games for something i have no control over. I just want the leave buster off my account because i wasn't able to even play since i couldn't see pretty much the entire screen besides the top quarter of it. Please read this and help me!

This is not my decision to make, but I hear you.  We'll want to look into these specific situations on a case by case basis.    Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we'll see what we can do.  This is **not **a guarantee!  {{summoner:31}}   See you there!

Thanks for the reply but i have sent in a support ticket. Do you know how long it takes for them to review my info? i just don't understand why i would have to serve a penalty for something i have no control over. Thanks again
I'm having this same problem. Seriously this needs to be fixed
